Sports and Clubs: Uttar Pradesh Power Lifting Champion (five times), winner of strongest Man of U.P and Best Lifter Award; two times National Power Lifting Champion, held national records in Bench Press; Asia Championship; won two Silver and two Bronze Medals; Member of the Indian National Team that won the Asian Championship held in Indonesia, 1984
Social And Cultural Activities: Social work for downtrodden and poor
Favourite Pastime and Recreation: Reading and visiting forests and organising sports championship
Educational Qualifications: Senior Cambridge Educated at St. Joseph`s College, Nainital, Uttarakhand
Name: Baba,Shri K.C. Singh
